name: fynx
description: Formerly known as Flox. Not quite Flux.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-only
scripts.cover: npm run lint && istanbul cover --report lcov _mocha -- -R spec
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls ; rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.dist: npm run babel && NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/index.js dist/fynx.js && NODE_ENV=production COMPRESS=1 webpack lib/index.js dist/fynx.min.js

author: Alan Plum <me@pluma.io>
